Widget.name: Tabs Container
Widget.Description: For tabbed navigation. Drop 'Tab' widgets within this widget to create tabs. Note: All tabs are preloaded on page load.

Option.name: Title
Option.Description: Specifies the widget title, that is to say, the header that will be displayed above the tabs.

Option.name: Display style
Option.Description: Specifies how to display the tabs.

Option.name: Vertical align
Option.Description: Specifies the vertical alignement of the tabs.

Option.name: Default opened tab
Option.Description: Specifies the index (0-based) of the tab that should be opened by default. Defaults to '0'.

Option.name: Save user opened tab
Option.Description: Specifies if the widget should restore the last opened page by the user.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the widget (pixels). You must enter an integer.
